item.title: Potion.java error (FAST) Fix

@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Vodzila, post:3, topic:430654”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=533330.msg3898720#msg3898720 date=1327549653]
Change the “p” instance to “c”.
[/quote]
Thanks it works
[size=10pt]how would i make the player dc c.logout(); wont disconnect the person?[/size][/quote]
Why would you send a message then disconnect them? Send another message which tells them to logout.

item.title: Potion.java error (FAST) Fix
item.dc:creator: @Vodzila Vodzila
item.description:
@Vodzila wrote:

hey guys im trying to add donator ticket that promotes you and its working good except when i try to make you add the players name to “donators” i get this error

potions.java:16: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable p
location: class potions
c.writeLog(p.playerName, “donators”);
^

and this is what im doing
case 748:
c.donator = 1;
c.sM(“Enjoy Your Donator! -From Ninja-”);
c.deleteItem(748, 1);
c.writeLog(p.playerName, “donators”); // this is the problem
c.logout();
break;

Read full topic
